sentences.en: a concert at Wembley Arena
sentences.cn: 在温布利体育馆举行的音乐会

sentences.en: a concert of French choral music
sentences.cn: 法国合唱音乐会

sentences.en: a concert of music by Bach
sentences.cn: 巴赫作品音乐会

sentences.en: a rock concert
sentences.cn: 摇滚音乐会

sentences.en: Big concert halls do not faze Melanie.
sentences.cn: 巨大的音乐厅不会让梅拉妮发慌。

sentences.en: Britain has to pursue policies in concert with other EU members.
sentences.cn: 英国必须和其他欧盟成员国一起贯彻各项政策。

sentences.en: Concert organisers branded the group's actions as puerile.
sentences.cn: 音乐会的组织者指称该乐队的行为愚蠢幼稚。

sentences.en: Her decision to cancel the concert is bound to disappoint her fans.
sentences.cn: 她决定取消这场音乐会，肯定会使她的歌迷失望。

sentences.en: In the end, we all decided to organize a concert for Easter.
sentences.cn: 最终，我们一致决定组织一场复活节音乐会。

sentences.en: It appeared that both the accused were acting in concert in the attack upon the deceased.
sentences.cn: 两名被告看来是合力袭击死者的。

sentences.en: Mahler's own imaginative orchestration was heard in the same concert.
sentences.cn: 在同一场音乐会上还演奏了马勒自己改编的别出心裁的管弦乐曲。

sentences.en: Now his other major works are creeping back into concert programmes.
sentences.cn: 现在他的其他主要作品又悄然出现在音乐会节目单上。

sentences.en: She managed to procure a ticket for the concert.
sentences.cn: 她好不容易弄到一张音乐会入场券。

sentences.en: She still does about 100 concerts every year.
sentences.cn: 她每年仍然举行100场左右的演唱会。

sentences.en: The acoustics of the new concert hall are excellent.
sentences.cn: 新音乐厅的传声效果极佳。

sentences.en: The concert was a predictable yawn.
sentences.cn: 果不其然，那场音乐会很乏味。

sentences.en: The proceeds from the concert will go towards famine relief.
sentences.cn: 音乐会的收入将用于救助饥荒。

sentences.en: Their concert there was a sell-out.
sentences.cn: 他们在那里举办的音乐会座无虚席。

sentences.en: they saw Pink Floyd in concert.
sentences.cn: 他们观看了《平克•弗洛伊德》的现场演出。

sentences.en: This piece really belongs in the concert hall.
sentences.cn: 这曲子很适合在音乐厅演奏。

sentences.en: This ticket entitles you to a free seat at the concert.
sentences.cn: 持这张票可以免费听音乐会.

sentences.en: we must take stronger action &B{in concert with} our European partners.
sentences.cn: 我们必须与我们的欧洲合伙人一致采取更强有力的行动。

sentences.en: We were going to a concert in Bath Abbey.
sentences.cn: 我们要去听一场在巴斯修道院内举行的音乐会。

words.tran_cn: 协调的；协定的；商议定的

phrases.tran_cn: 去听音乐会，去参加音乐会
和…相呼应；与…合作；和…一致
流行音乐会；通俗音乐会

trans.tran_cn: 音乐会用的；在音乐会上演出的

trans.tran_en: a performance given by musicians or singers
